sentences.en: After a four - year hiatus, inspectors are expecting to return to Iraq.
sentences.cn: 阔别四年后,武检人员将再度进入伊拉克.

sentences.en: Diplomatic efforts to reach a settlement resume today after a two-week hiatus.
sentences.cn: 在两周间歇后，为达成解决方案而进行的外交努力于今天重新开始。

sentences.en: Even a brief hiatus in their supply is intolerable.
sentences.cn: 这些服务供应哪怕短暂中断都是无法容忍的.

sentences.en: Hiatus hernia is rarely found to be associated with partial gastric obstruction.
sentences.cn: 食道裂孔赫尼亚很少被发现并发有部分胃阻塞.

sentences.en: Lift the cerebral dura mater to exposure greater superficial petrosal nerve, facial hiatus and arcuate eminence.
sentences.cn: 显微镜下将脑膜抬起,暴露出岩浅大神经 、 面神经裂孔和弓状隆起.

sentences.en: Methods : To drip the liquid from sacral hiatus to epidural.
sentences.cn: 方法将药液自骶裂孔注入到硬膜外腔.

sentences.en: Mr Loker brought down his fist with a thump that fully explained the hiatus.
sentences.cn: 洛克先生的拳头砰地一声落在桌子上,充分说明了他后半句的意思.

sentences.en: My marriage is not ending. It's just on hiatus.
sentences.cn: 我的婚姻还没完，只是有点裂缝。

sentences.en: Such truncation is evidence of an erosional hiatus.
sentences.cn: 这种削蚀现象是侵蚀沉积间断的证据.

sentences.en: The airflow in the maxillary air sinus and by the maxillary hiatus was slow.
sentences.cn: 上颌窦口和上颌窦内的气体流速均较低.

sentences.en: The development of a new department was placed on hiatus.
sentences.cn: 新部门的发展暂时中断.

sentences.en: The hiatus in sedimentation is filled in progressively from below.
sentences.cn: 沉积间断面是从下边逐渐填满的.

sentences.en: There was a hiatus in his acting life.
sentences.cn: 他的演艺生涯曾一度中断。

sentences.en: There was a hiatus in their correspondence.
To explore the effect of cerebelli hiatus incision of severe brain injury complicated from tentorial herniation.
sentences.cn: 探讨小脑幕裂孔切开术在救治重度颅脑损伤合并颞叶钩回疝的作用.

sentences.en: Toplap is evidence of a nonde - positional hiatus.
sentences.cn: 顶部超覆是无沉积作用间断的证据.

sentences.en: We renewed our friendship after a hiatus of 10 years.
sentences.cn: 十年后,我们重新开始一段友情.

trans.tran_en: A hiatus is a pause in which nothing happens, or a gap where something is missing
